descriptionHtml:
This is a mod for Skyrim which replaces most of the soundtrack (music) of Skyrim with much better-sounding, more captivating music.

NOTE: I did not create/ compose ANY of this music, and all music rights go to the names below.

Credits for music: Mattia Cupelli, Andrian Von Ziegler, Jeremy and Julian Soule, Jesper Kyd, Junichi Nakatsuru, Thomas Begersen and Nick Phoenix, Russell Brower, Martin O' Donnell and Michael Salvatori, Lisa Gerrard, Christophe Beck, Jamie Christopherson, Hideyuki Fukasawa, Shunsuke Kida, Motoi Sakuraba, Yuki Kajiura, Tadayoshi Makino, and jdrcomposer(youtube name)

NOTE 2: If you have Open Cities: Skyrim, this causes problems and songs will overlap when you enter any town or city, and I will soon make a version for Open Cities: Skyrim, so this does not occur for users of both mods.

NOTE 3: This mod does not effect the main menu theme and will not conflict with a mod that ONLY changes the main theme.

Personally, I recommend that you get the mods called 'Sounds of Skyrim', when you get this mod. It will give you a more captivating experience, but will be even more so with this mod.
author: Canthon1
